summary: Completed comprehensive testing of v0 clone Preview tab functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (5/5 tests passed). Preview tab iframe rendering is working correctly for most component types. Found one minor issue with complex components that use PropTypes.

integration_issues.issue: Some generated components fail to render when they include PropTypes imports that are not available in the iframe environment
integration_issues.example: Card component with PropTypes dependency shows 'PropTypes is not defined' error
integration_issues.workaround: Simple components without PropTypes render successfully

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (Preview working for most components, minor PropTypes issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Consider updating the LivePreview component to either include PropTypes in the iframe environment or modify the system prompt to avoid generating components with PropTypes imports. The core Preview functionality is working correctly.
